data.actual_result: Discord freezes and you need to restart it
data.expected_result: You get moved without any problem
data.short_description: Discord crashes freezes when getting moved in a multiple people voice call
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice call - Get a someone to move you in another voice call with 3 persons or more (not in an empty voice call, it didn't freeze when I got moved into an empty voice call)
